query:
SELECT t.id, t.name
            FROM tags t
            LEFT JOIN tags_synonyms ts ON ts.tag_id = t.id
            WHERE t.name % $1
                OR ts.name % $1
            ORDER BY LEAST(
                similarity(t.name, 'user_input'),
                COALESCE(similarity(ts.name, 'user_input'), 0)
            ) DESC
